# Engine

### Screen 

- [x] Fully support Windows
- [ ] Fully support UNIX
- [x] Screen auto size
- [x] Drawing pixels
- [x] FPS limit
- [x] Keyboard input


### Rendering

2D

- [x] Rectangles
- [x] Sprites
- [x] Ellipses
- [x] Collision detection
- [ ] Text 

3D

- [ ] Polygons
- [ ] Shading
- [ ] Textures
